raw_body: RANJITH – GUNASINGHE,​ Son of the late Dr. P.C. Gunasinghe and Mrs Anula Gunasinghe,​ brother of Nihal,​ late Chitra,​ late Asoka,​ Lalith and late Gamini,​ passed away peacefully. May his journey go swiftly towards Nibbana. Remains lie at Jayaratne The Restpect Funeral Parlour from 9 a.m. on Saturday the 2nd of December. Cortege leaves at 4.30 p.m. for cremation at Old Crematorium,​ General Cemetery,​ Borella at 5 p.m.079705
